title: Web Clips (com.apple.webClip.managed)
description: Use this section to define web clips

Label.title: Label
Label.description: The name of the Web Clip

URL.title: URL
URL.description: The URL that's displayed when users open the Web Clip. The URL must begin with HTTP or HTTPS

IsRemovable.title: Removable
IsRemovable.description: Whether the Web Clip can be removed by users

Precomposed.title: Precomposed Icon
Precomposed.description: Prevents the iOS device from adding a shine to the image

FullScreen.title: Full Screen
FullScreen.description: Opens the URL as a web app without a browser

IgnoreManifestScope.title: Ignore Manifest Scope
IgnoreManifestScope.description: If true, a full screen web clip will not show the Safari UI when navigating to URLs other than the web clip's own.

TargetApplicationBundleIdentifier.title: Target Application Bundle Identifier
TargetApplicationBundleIdentifier.description: Bundle identifier of the application that opens this web clip's URL.
